data.message: Whenever we lose electricity for more than a day or so the back up generators for the cell towers quit also and we have no cell phone use

replies.message: Hey Diane. Our goal is for this tool to be as useful as possible. As we gather as much information as possible about each disaster, we will consider facts on the ground, like damage to infrastructure. These considerations may influence whether and / when to activate. -Hailey
I know that Diane Wertham but i wasn't referring to that
Cell phone tower  next to our house has lp generator back up.   Let the power go out and we still has cell phones
